name: Le pissenlit 🌬️🌼
description:
Game :

Game made for Brackeys game jam 2023.1 with the theme "An end is a new begining".

Instructions :

Draw wind line with your mouse to push dandelion seed forward and try to go as far as possible. Becareful, seeds can not fly indefinitely.

You can erase all you wind lines with right click.

Credits :

Art and code by me.

Music made for the game by Jules Cournut
